Two-Handed Weapon Specialization.name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
descriptions: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 4%.
Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 6%.
Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 8%.
Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 10%.

Melee Specialization.name: Melee Specialization
descriptions: Increases your melee attack speed by 20% but reduces your ranged attack speed by 19% and increases the shot time of your Aimed Shot and Multi-Shot by 1.5 sec.

Dual Wield Specialization.name: Dual Wield Specialization
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 20%.
Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 30%.
Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 40%.
Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 50%.

Improved Raptor Strike.name: Improved Raptor Strike
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Raptor Strike by 1 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Raptor Strike by 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Raptor Strike by 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Raptor Strike by 4 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Raptor Strike by 5 sec.

Improved Wing Clip.name: Improved Wing Clip
descriptions: Gives your Wing Clip ability a 5% chance to immobilize the target for $19229d.
Gives your Wing Clip ability a 10% chance to immobilize the target for $19229d.
Gives your Wing Clip ability a 15% chance to immobilize the target for $19229d.

Improved Tracking.name: Improved Tracking
descriptions: While tracking Beasts, Demons, Dragonkin, Elementals, Giants, Humanoids and Undead, all damage caused to those types by the Hunter is increased by 3%. Also increases the effectiveness of Track Hidden.

While tracking Beasts, Demons, Dragonkin, Elementals, Giants, Humanoids and Undead, all damage caused to those types by the Hunter is increased by 6%. Also increases the effectiveness of Track Hidden.

While tracking Beasts, Demons, Dragonkin, Elementals, Giants, Humanoids and Undead, all damage caused to those types by the Hunter is increased by 9%. Also increases the effectiveness of Track Hidden.

While tracking Beasts, Demons, Dragonkin, Elementals, Giants, Humanoids and Undead, all damage caused to those types by the Hunter is increased by 12%. Also increases the effectiveness of Track Hidden.

While tracking Beasts, Demons, Dragonkin, Elementals, Giants, Humanoids and Undead, all damage caused to those types by the Hunter is increased by 15%. Also increases the effectiveness of Track Hidden.

Clever Traps.name: Clever Traps
descriptions: Increases the duration of Freezing and Frost trap effects by 15% and the damage of Immolation and Explosive trap effects by 15%.
Increases the duration of Freezing and Frost trap effects by 30% and the damage of Immolation and Explosive trap effects by 30%.

Brutality.name: Brutality
descriptions: Increases your and your pet's chance to get a critical strike in melee by 1%. Also increases the critical strike chance of Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite by an additional 2%.
Increases your and your pet's chance to get a critical strike in melee by 2%. Also increases the critical strike chance of Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite by an additional 4%.
Increases your and your pet's chance to get a critical strike in melee by 3%. Also increases the critical strike chance of Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite by an additional 6%.
Increases your and your pet's chance to get a critical strike in melee by 4%. Also increases the critical strike chance of Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite by an additional 8%.
Increases your and your pet's chance to get a critical strike in melee by 5%. Also increases the critical strike chance of Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite by an additional 10%.

Deterrence.name: Deterrence
descriptions: Increases your chance to Dodge and Parry by 25% and reflects the next spell cast on you. Lasts dIndex=1.

Deflection.name: Deflection
descriptions: Increases your Parry chance by 2%.
Increases your Parry chance by 3%.
Increases your Parry chance by 4%.
Increases your Parry chance by 5%.

Whirling Axe.name: Whirling Axe
descriptions: Hurls an axe at a target, causing damage equal to 10% of your melee attack power and slowing the target's movement speed by 50% for dIndex=1. This attack always crits. It also interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for $34217d.

Lightning Reflexes.name: Lightning Reflexes
descriptions: Increases your attack speed and Agility by 2%.
Increases your attack speed and Agility by 4%.
Increases your attack speed and Agility by 6%.
Increases your attack speed and Agility by 8%.
Increases your attack speed and Agility by 10%.

Find Weakness.name: Find Weakness
descriptions: Your ranged critical strikes have a 20% chance to reveal a flaw in your target's defenses, increasing the critical strike chance of attacks made against that target by an additional $33589s1% for $33589d.

Your ranged critical strikes have a 40% chance to reveal a flaw in your target's defenses, increasing the critical strike chance of attacks made against that target by an additional $33589s1% for $33589d.

Your ranged critical strikes have a 60% chance to reveal a flaw in your target's defenses, increasing the critical strike chance of attacks made against that target by an additional $33589s1% for $33589d.

Your ranged critical strikes have a 80% chance to reveal a flaw in your target's defenses, increasing the critical strike chance of attacks made against that target by an additional $33589s1% for $33589d.

Your ranged critical strikes have a 100% chance to reveal a flaw in your target's defenses, increasing the critical strike chance of attacks made against that target by an additional $33589s1% for $33589d.

Wyvern Sting.name: Wyvern Sting
descriptions:
A stinging shot that puts the target to sleep for up to dIndex=3.  Any damage will cancel the effect.  When the target wakes up, the Sting slowing movement speed by $24131s2% and causes $24131o1 Nature damage over $24131d.
Only usable out of combat.  Only one Sting per Hunter can be active on the target at a time.

Savage Blow.name: Savage Blow
descriptions:
Wild strike with both weapons that grants bonus effects dependent on your active Aspect.

Aspect of the Beast: 
Savage Blow hits additional enemies near the target.

Aspect of the Cheetah: 
Makes you immune to movement impairing effects for $34236d.

Aspect of the Hawk: 
Increases the range of Savage Blow by $25296s3 yd.

Aspect of the Monkey: 
Allows you to use Mongoose Bite.

Aspect of the Pack: 
Reduces the cost of all spells and abilities
of all nearby party members by $34237s1% for $34237d.

Aspect of the Wild: 
Regenerates $34238o1% of your total Health over $34238d.
Stacks up to $34238u times.

Deep Freeze.name: Deep Freeze
descriptions: Physical attacks against the target, affected by your Freezing Trap, have an additional 15% to be critical. In addition, increases the movement speed reduction of your Frost Trap by 10%.
Physical attacks against the target, affected by your Freezing Trap, have an additional 30% to be critical. In addition, increases the movement speed reduction of your Frost Trap by 20%.
Physical attacks against the target, affected by your Freezing Trap, have an additional 45% to be critical. In addition, increases the movement speed reduction of your Frost Trap by 30%.

Thrill of the Hunt.name: Thrill of the Hunt
descriptions: Your melee and ranged attacks have a chance to restore Mana equal to triple your level.
Your melee and ranged attacks have a chance to restore Mana equal to triple your level. Effect occurs more often than Thrill of the Hunt (Rank 1).
Your melee and ranged attacks have a chance to restore Mana equal to triple your level. Effect occurs more often than Thrill of the Hunt (Rank 2).

Killer Instinct.name: Killer Instinct
descriptions: Increases hit and crit chance by 1% for both you and your pet.
Increases hit and crit chance by 2% for both you and your pet.
Increases hit and crit chance by 3% for both you and your pet.

Trapper.name: Trapper
descriptions: Gives your traps a 10% chance to entrap the target, preventing them from moving for $19185d. In addition, decreases the chance enemies will resist Feign Death and trap effects by 5%.
Gives your traps a 20% chance to entrap the target, preventing them from moving for $19185d. In addition, decreases the chance enemies will resist Feign Death and trap effects by 10%.

Survivalist.name: Survivalist
descriptions: Decreases damage taken by 2%.  In addition, cures $34019s1 poison $leffect:effects; from you every $t3 sec.
Decreases damage taken by 4%.  In addition, cures $34019s1 poison $leffect:effects; from you every $t3 sec.
Decreases damage taken by 6%.  In addition, cures $34019s1 poison $leffect:effects; from you every $t3 sec.
Decreases damage taken by 8%.  In addition, cures $34019s1 poison $leffect:effects; from you every $t3 sec.
Decreases damage taken by 10%.  In addition, cures $34019s1 poison $leffect:effects; from you every $t3 sec.
